ygData.subject: Re: Good to see...good to see
ygData.msgSnippet: There is an article in EverQuest Express on this subject. http://eqx.simplenet.com/  Snyak. ... From:	Jason Coan
ygData.messageBody:
There is an article in EverQuest Express on this subject.

http://eqx.simplenet.com/ <http://eqx.simplenet.com/>


Snyak.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Coan [mailto:COANJ@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 4:00 PM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Good to see...good to see

From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>

Speaking of women.....There is one big question I
have.....why do guys play girl characters....some say they are role
playing.....do they also dress up in womens close and role play women in
real life? or is "role playing" a female the first step towards role
playing a real life female? I know there are a lot of legitimate female
players, but I'd bet a large sum of money that most of the female characters
are being driven by guys.....call me homophobic if you will, but I think its
weird.

>>> <suzkim@...> 5.19.99 12:47:10 PM >>>
From: suzkim@...

Hail,

It was good to see another of the female gender with a
passion for
slashin an bashing!
Currently on a mission to get my four bubbles for dual
attack and dual
weild *snickers*.

*grumbles*
gotta take care of some RL stuff so I can hunt.. hunt..hunt

Azlana, Barbarian Warrior of Veeshan
